attributes.action: Uber to make Prius Plus an XL.
attributes.additional_details: TFL who gives us the PCO on the Prius plus and allows us to carry upto six passengers, I don’t know why Uber won’t allow it.
attributes.background: Prius plus is not smaller than vauxhall Zafira Which is an XL with Uber already and we spent more more to buy or rent the car than the small shape which Uberx. The car can carry 6 people and very comfortably as well
